articles.title: Wait for bodies deepens pain of families after Air India crash - BBC
articles.description: Officials said on Saturday that 11 victims had been identified so far based on their DNA samples.
articles.content:
Zoya Mateen
The plane crashed shortly after takeoff in a residential neighbourhood in the city of Ahmedabad
For Mistry Jignesh, 72 hours feel like an eternity.
Since Thursday evening, Mr Jignesh a… [+6199 chars]
